com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport

Class ItemCountCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.networksearchservice.transport.ItemCountCondition

  • public final class ItemCountCondition
extends Object
    A condition on a NetworkSearchNode that means a network of Items only matches a search if the number of Items at that position in the network meets the condition.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemCountCondition(ItemCountOperator operator, List<Integer> values)
      Constructs a new ItemCountCondition, initializing all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemCountOperator getOperator()
      Gets the ItemCountOperator that specifies what comparison is performed when this ItemCountCondition is evaluated.
      List<Integer> getValues()
      Gets the value or values to use with the ItemCountOperator when this ItemCountCondition is evaluated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemCountCondition

        public ItemCountCondition(ItemCountOperator operator,
                          List<Integer> values)
        Constructs a new ItemCountCondition, initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        operator - The ItemCountOperator that specifies what comparison is performed when this ItemCountCondition is evaluated.
        values - The value or values to use with the ItemCountOperator when this ItemCountCondition is evaluated. The appropriate number of values depends on the operator.
        ItemCountOperator.EQUAL_TO
        A single non-zero positive integer value.
        ItemCountOperator.BETWEEN
        A pair of non-zero positive integer values, where the order of the values is not important.
        ItemCountOperator.GREATER_THAN
        A single positive integer value (that may be zero).
        ItemCountOperator.GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO
        A single non-zero positive integer value.

    • Method Detail

      • getOperator

        public ItemCountOperator getOperator()
        Gets the ItemCountOperator that specifies what comparison is performed when this ItemCountCondition is evaluated.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getValues

        public List<Integer> getValues()
        Gets the value or values to use with the ItemCountOperator when this ItemCountCondition is evaluated.
        Returns:
        See above.
